data.name: Sneezeman: Return To Planet Sneeze
data.detailed_description:
Help the Worlds #1 sneeze-powered superhero run, jump, bounce, grind and sneeze his way out of trouble in the incredible new adventure 'Return to Planet Sneeze'!

Beware gamers! Sneezeman is not for the faint hearted, you will need an iron will and finely honed, next level motor skills to help our hapless hero escape the relentless clutches of the ‘sneeze cloud’...

Are you quick enough to save Sneezeman and return order to the Sneeze-verse?

* Exciting platform style game play and a huge range of challenges to overcome!
* Escape the evil clutches of the ‘sneeze cloud’!
* Outwit lethal zombies, ghosts, rats, robbers, aliens, tigers and more!
* Fight through amazing worlds; Jungle, Haunted, Urban and Mars!
* 40 levels of contagious chaos!
* Run, jump, grind & bounce your way to success!
* Test your sneeze in a fun mini game!
* Challenging game play!
* Comedic narrative & epic soundtrack (now available to stream on all good platforms)!

**New levels, shop & multiplayer coming soon!**

data.short_description: Help the Worlds #1 sneeze-powered superhero run, jump, bounce, grind and sneeze his way out of trouble in the incredible new adventure 'Return to Planet Sneeze'! Avoid the chaotic sneeze cloud, out manoeuvre goose-stepping bad guys and navigate giant virus spores. Can you Escape from Planet Sneeze?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card made within the last 4 years (Pixel Shader 3.0, Vertex Shader 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Support: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
